nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic undertook a mission to the planet Quarmendy to take the floating city Nexus from Confederacy of Independent Systems control. Jedi General Plo Koon led an attack on the Separatist vulture droid forces, while Clone Commander CC-3636 "Wolffe" attempted to infiltrate the Nexus. Emir Wat Tambor, refusing to allow the Nexus to fall into enemy hands, destroyed the city, while the Republic rescued the Nexus's custodian, Orkle, taking no casualties.
